content.text:
# Muzz MacPherson Award

The Muzz MacPherson Award is a trophy that is presented to the Manitoba Junior Hockey League coach judged to have contributed the most to his teamâ€™s success.  The trophy is named after former  coach Murray MacPherson, who led the Portage Terriers to the 1973 Centennial Cup national championship.
